meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a secretary.
meanings.sent1: The secretarial duties involve organizing files and answering phone calls.
meanings.sent2: She has a secretarial job where she types letters and schedules appointments.
meanings.sent3: The secretarial staff had a race to see who could type the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her efficiency in completing secretarial tasks was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The importance of secretarial skills cannot be underestimated in an office setting.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to secretaries or their work.
meanings.sent1: The office manager praised her for her secretarial expertise.
meanings.sent2: He attended a secretarial training course to improve his administrative skills.
meanings.sent3: The secretarial team celebrated their successful completion of a big project.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her secretarial duties was truly commendable.
meanings.sent5: The secretarial department plays a crucial role in the smooth functioning of the office.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of a secretary or a secretary's skills.
meanings.sent1: Her secretarial experience made her the perfect candidate for the job.
meanings.sent2: The company offered a competitive salary for the secretarial position.
meanings.sent3: The secretarial training program helped her enhance her professional abilities.
meanings.sent4: His attention to detail in his secretarial tasks was exceptional.
meanings.sent5: She demonstrated exceptional secretarial skills during the meeting.
